original_title: Prices of Laugfs domestic gas cylinders also reduced
original_body_lines: The Laugfs Gas PLC, one of the two largest liquefied petroleum (LP) gas suppliers in the country, too slashed the prices of its domestic gas cylinders by a significant amount following the price reduction announced by Litro Gas Lanka Ltd. earlier today.
Meanwhile, Litro Gas Lanka also dropped the prices of its domestic gas cylinders substantially:

The companies said the price reduction, effective from midnight today (April 04), was made in a bid to provide relief to the crisis-hit consumers in view of the upcoming festive season and the benefit of the recent appreciation of the Sri Lankan rupee against the US dollar.
